name: Defend The Bunker (itch)
description:
5 of the most important governmental figures has hidden themselves in a bunker in a remote area. Robots made by a uprising of factory workers are coming to eliminate them and you in your mech suit with heavy bullets and a light machine gun on the top, how long can you keep them alive?

Controls

W/S - Move Forwards/Backwards

A/D - Rotate Base Left/Right

E - Use Pulse

LMB/RMB - Fire Left Turret/Right Turret (or Top Turret if reloading other turrets)

Scroll Wheel - Move Top Turret Up and Down
